query: A company has a no-retaliation policy: 'Employees who report misconduct in good faith shall not face adverse employment actions.' Employee X reports their manager Y for harassment. Two weeks later, X is transferred to a less desirable position due to 'restructuring.' Six other employees were also transferred in the restructuring. Is this retaliation? What evidence would X need to prove their case?
